'''Survival Grilled Fish''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Grilled Tiger Fish]] with [[Keqing]]. The [[recipe]] for Grilled Tiger Fish is obtainable from [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 1,250 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 15.

Survival Grilled Fish restores '''16'''% of Max HP and an additional '''1,350''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* To celebrate Keqing's birthday, the official Chinese site for ''Genshin Impact'' published a blog post purportedly by Long Erjun, columnist for [[The Steambird]], with a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/11751 real-life recipe] for Survival Grilled Fish. Also included in this edition was a recipe for Grilled Tiger Fish.
*The following birthday mails included Survival Grilled Fish:
** [[Birthday/Keqing#See You Tonight!|Keqing's 2020 Birthday Mail]] (1 Survival Grilled Fish)
** [[Birthday/Keqing#Time Flies|Keqing's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (1 Survival Grilled Fish)
